EncryptionEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether encryption is enabled.

EncryptionKey.description: Gets or sets the key of the simple encryption.

Alias.description: Gets or sets the alias of the key in the keystore.

Location.description: Gets or sets the location of the keystore.

Password.description: Gets or sets the keystore password.

KeyStore.description: Gets the settings related to the key store.

Algorithm.description: Gets or sets the RSA algorithm (DEFAULT or OAEP). Default value: DEFAULT.

Salt.description: Gets or sets the salt value. Default value: deadbeef.

Strong.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the strong encryption flag is enabled.

RSA.description: Gets the settings related to RSA encryption.

Encrypt.description: Holds settings used to configure encryption for the Spring Cloud Config Server provider.
